summary: Provides utilities for defining, validating, listing, and executing user‑specified shell hooks that are triggered at various stages of the certificate lifecycle (pre‑hook, post‑hook, deploy, renew). The module handles command preparation, execution, and error handling for these external scripts.
business_intent: Allow Certbot and its plugins to extend functionality by running custom scripts at key points in certificate issuance and renewal, ensuring hooks are correctly formatted and safely executed.
